content.text: Match ends, Recreativo 2, Barcelona B 0.
Second Half ends, Recreativo 2, Barcelona B 0.
Corner,  Recreativo. Conceded by Iván Balliu.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Jesús Cabrero (Recreativo) because of an injury.
Jesús Cabrero (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jean Marie Dongou (Barcelona B).
Corner,  Barcelona B. Conceded by Cifu.
Javier Espinosa (Barcelona B) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Luis Alberto.
Corner,  Barcelona B. Conceded by Juan Antonio Zamora.
Corner,  Barcelona B. Conceded by Cifu.
Attempt blocked. Luis Alberto (Barcelona B) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Joan Román.
Substitution, Recreativo. Albert Puigdollers replaces Ángel Montoro.

Foul by Jordi Matamala (Recreativo).

Substitution, Recreativo. Alexander Szymanowski replaces Chuli.
Hand ball by Jean Marie Dongou (Barcelona B).
Attempt blocked. Kiko Femenía (Barcelona B) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Rafinha.
Attempt saved. Jesús Berrocal (Recreativo) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Juan Antonio Zamora.
Attempt missed. Ángel Montoro (Recreativo) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left. Assisted by Juan Antonio Zamora.
Substitution, Barcelona B. Joan Román replaces Carles Planas.
Substitution, Barcelona B. Javier Espinosa replaces Ilie Sánchez.
Foul by Ruyman (Recreativo).
Sergi Roberto (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Recreativo. Conceded by Carles Planas.
Offside, Recreativo. Jordi Matamala tries a through ball, but Jesús Berrocal is caught offside.
Iván Balliu (Barcelona B) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Jonathan Valle (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Iván Balliu (Barcelona B).
Rafinha (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jordi Matamala (Recreativo).
Goal!  Recreativo 2, Barcelona B 0. Jesús Berrocal (Recreativo) header from very close range to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Ángel Montoro with a cross following a corner.

David Lombán (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
